review.title: “Loved my job, Like a big family”
review.pros: Pros – I had a lot of fun working for this company. The owner was one of the best bosses a person could ask for.
review.cons: Cons – Health care plans were offred to upper managment only other wise you got some finiacial support to buy your own. and pay could be a little more.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Continue to treat your people with respect and they will continue to love working for. If every one had this type of company to work for there would be more happy people in the world.
